author: purplecabbage
msg: Fixed setAutoresizingMask. It was accessed as a method when it is a property.

author: becka11y
msg: update find, remove for optional error callback

Previously js and obj. C code assumed error callback was required.   Updated PhoneGap.exec to skip empty arguments rather than passing empty string.  Also bug fix for correct parameters for stringWithFormat calls when returning error code (was using %@ rather than @d).  After save now return complete contact.

author: becka11y
msg: The settings for multiple, limit, and updatedSince in the ContactOptions are now supported when doing a find.  Only records that also meet these criteria are returned.

author: becka11y
msg: When retrieving photo saves data in tmp directory and returns fileURI (similar to camera.getPicture).  tmp directory is deleted when application exits.  When setting photo, expects URL string.  Attempts to retrieve data from URL and set as photo.  Will only
work if there is a data connection.   Also updated contact.js so can pass empty strings into Contact objects.

author: purplecabbage
msg: Added Javascript Callback shouldRotateToOrientation which is called before looking up supportedOrientations in the plist. shouldRotateToOrientation should return true or false depending on it's current state/preference. shouldRotateToOrientation is expected to exist in the global scope.
